recipe.title: Lemon-Dill Sauce
ingredients: 1/2 cup (1 stick) chilled unsalted butter, cut into 8 pieces
instructions: Boil wine, shallot and lemon juice in medium saucepan over high heat until reduced to 1/4 cup, about 6 minutes. Reduce heat to low; add butter, 1 piece at a time, whisking until melted before adding more. Remove pan from heat. Stir in dill. Season to taste with salt and pepper.
